document_data.name: Justal Iroon
document_data.mainbody: '''Justal Iroon''' was a mage at some point before the turn of the 9{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: At some point before the turn of the 9{{th}} century, when Justal Iroon was already an old man, he was slain by [[Radellus]], who fancied his tower near [[Sreve]] for his own. Radellus flung Justal Iroon's smoking body the length of Sreve's main street; it was then whisked into the millpond, killing all its fish. Unknown to either mage, a young [[Kurtal]] snuck into the tower and stole three of Justal's spellbooks during the exchange of spells.
